Package mgui.geometry.util

Class MatrixFunctions

java.lang.Object
mgui.interfaces.Utility
mgui.geometry.util.MatrixFunctions
public class MatrixFunctions
extends Utility
Utility class providing functions on Jama matrices.

Author:
